Class ScreenPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jwetherell.augmented_reality.data.ScreenPosition

  • public class ScreenPosition
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used mostly as a utility to calculate relative positions.
    Author:
    Justin Wetherell
